attributes.action: Increase the awareness of the risks over the internet and on social media.
attributes.background: We want to raise awareness so that we can prevent any further damage to people through unsafe use of the internet. We have seen awful stories surrounding this topic and want these to change. We want happier stories so that people can see that the internet is a wonderful place that they can visit it.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call clearly for a specific action from the UK Government or Parliament. You could start a new petition calling for a specific action to raise awareness on this issue.
